No catalogue is planned for this year, so I understand. There may be a 2005=
 suppliment coming out eventually, showing all the items not illustrated in=
 the 2005 catalogue but its premature for me to to say much about this righ=
t now. All takes a lot of work to produce a quality publication, work and m=
oney. If and when something can be announced I'll definitely "put the word =
out" to everyone. 

Ron
STL
